item.text: Now after some days, when he returned to Capernaum, the news spread that he was at home.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="4863" class="">gathered</st> <st data-num="5620" class="">that</st> there was <st data-num="3371">no longer</st> <st data-num="5562">any room</st>, <st data-num="3366">not even</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">by</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="2980" class="">preached</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

Some people<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="5342" class="">bringing</st> <st data-num="4314">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> a <st data-num="3885" class="">paralytic</st>, <st data-num="142" class="">carried</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="5064" class="">four</st> of them.<n id="2" />

When they were <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="4374" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> in <st data-num="1223">because of</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st>, they <st data-num="648" class="">removed</st> the <st data-num="4721" class="">roof</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3699" class="">above</st> Jesus.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st>,<n id="3" /> after <st data-num="1846" class="">tearing</st> it <st data-num="1846">out</st>, they <st data-num="5465" class="">lowered</st> the <st data-num="2895" class="">stretcher</st> the <st data-num="3885" class="">paralytic</st> was <st data-num="2621">lying on</st>.

When <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to the <st data-num="3885" class="">paralytic</st>, “<st data-num="5043">Son</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> are <st data-num="863" class="">forgiven</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> of the <st data-num="1122" class="">experts in the law</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="2521" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st>, <st data-num="1260" class="">turning</st> these things <st data-num="1260">over</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">minds:</st><n id="2" />

“<st data-num="5101" class="">Why</st> does <st data-num="3778">this man</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="3779">this way</st>? He is <st data-num="987">blaspheming</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="863" class="">forgive</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> <st data-num="1508">but</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">alone</st>?”

<st data-num="2532" class="">Now</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2117" class="">immediately</st>, when <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">realized</st> in <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> they were <st data-num="1260" class="">contemplating</st> such thoughts,<n id="2" /> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Why</st> are you <st data-num="1260" class="">thinking</st> <st data-num="3778">such things</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>?<n id="3" />

<st data-num="5101" class="">Which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2123" class="">easier</st>,<n id="1" /> to <st data-num="3004">say</st> to the <st data-num="3885" class="">paralytic</st>, ‘<st data-num="4771" class="">Your</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> are <st data-num="863" class="">forgiven,’</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> to <st data-num="3004">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="1453">Stand up</st>, <st data-num="142" class="">take</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2895" class="">stretcher</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">walk’</st>?

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> you may <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> to <st data-num="863" class="">forgive</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st>,”—he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to the <st data-num="3885" class="">paralytic</st><n id="3" />—

“I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1453" class="">stand up</st>, <st data-num="142" class="">take</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2895" class="">stretcher</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5217" class="">go</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">home</st>.”<n id="1" />
And immediately the man stood up, took his stretcher, and went out in front of them all. They were all amazed and glorified God, saying, “We have never seen anything like this!”
Jesus went out again by the sea. The whole crowd came to him, and he taught them.

As he <st data-num="3855">went along</st>, he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3018" class="">Levi</st>, the son of <st data-num="256" class="">Alphaeus</st>, <st data-num="2521" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="5058">tax booth</st>.<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="190" class="">Follow</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>,” he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="450">got up</st> and <st data-num="190" class="">followed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

As <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="2621">having a meal</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Levi’s</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3614" class="">home</st>, <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="5057">tax collectors</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st> were <st data-num="4873" class="">eating</st> with <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> who <st data-num="190" class="">followed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

When the <st data-num="1122" class="">experts in the law</st><n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he was <st data-num="2068" class="">eating</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5057" class="">tax collectors</st>, they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, “Why does he <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5057" class="">tax collectors</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st>?”<n id="3" />
When Jesus heard this he said to them, “Those who are healthy don’t need a physician, but those who are sick do. I have not come to call the righteous, but sinners.”
Now John’s disciples and the Pharisees were fasting. So they came to Jesus and said, “Why do the disciples of John and the disciples of the Pharisees fast, but your disciples don’t fast?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “The <st data-num="3567" class="">wedding</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">guests</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3361 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="3522" class="">fast</st> while the <st data-num="3566" class="">bridegroom</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, can they?<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3745">As long as</st> they <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> the <st data-num="3566" class="">bridegroom</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> they <st data-num="1410">do</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3522" class="">fast</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> are <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="3566" class="">bridegroom</st> will be <st data-num="522" class="">taken</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">time</st><n id="2" /> they will <st data-num="3522">fast</st>.

<st data-num="3762">No one</st> <st data-num="1976" class="">sews</st> a <st data-num="4470" class="">patch</st> of <st data-num="46" class="">unshrunk</st> <st data-num="1915" class="">cloth</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> an <st data-num="3820" class="">old</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">garment;</st> <st data-num="1508">otherwise</st>, the <st data-num="4138">patch</st> <st data-num="142">pulls away</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, the <st data-num="2537" class="">new</st> from the <st data-num="3820" class="">old</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4978" class="">tear</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">becomes</st> <st data-num="5501" class="">worse</st>.
And no one pours new wine into old wineskins; otherwise, the wine will burst the skins, and both the wine and the skins will be destroyed. Instead new wine is poured into new wineskins.”
Jesus was going through the grain fields on a Sabbath, and his disciples began to pick some heads of wheat as they made their way.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2396">Look</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> are they <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> is <st data-num="3756">against</st> the <st data-num="1832">law</st> on the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st>?”

He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “Have you <st data-num="3763" class="">never</st> <st data-num="314" class="">read</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">did</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> he <st data-num="2192" class="">was</st> <st data-num="5532">in need</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3588 3326">companions</st> were <st data-num="3983" class="">hungry</st>—

<st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> he <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> the <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1909">when</st> <st data-num="8" class="">Abiathar</st> was <st data-num="749">high priest</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2068">ate</st> the <st data-num="4286" class="">sacred</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="3756" class="">law</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1508">for any but</st> the <st data-num="2409" class="">priests</st> to <st data-num="2068">eat</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> it to <st data-num="846">his</st> <st data-num="3588 4862">companions</st>?”<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “The <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st> was <st data-num="1096" class="">made</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st>.
For this reason the Son of Man is lord even of the Sabbath.”
